summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4688 for the improvement of Kenyon Place Southwest, from Fauntleroy Avenue to a point 500 feet east thereof; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54333, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
